abstract: texas apse class 4a all-state football team .
article: the 2017 texas associated press sports editors class 4a all-state high school football team , released tuesday . voting based on regular-season performance . players are listed in alphabetical order at each position . first-team offenselinemen : -- ian burnette , wimberley , sr. . -- 96 percent grade , 94 knockdowns , 42 ko blocks -- andrew flanagan , kennedale , sr. . -- blocked for team that averaged 54.5 points and 350 rushing yards per game -- caden jander , cuero , jr. . -- 72 knockdowns , 96 percent grade for offense that averaged 54.6 points and 469 ypg -- ty rhyner , rio hondo , sr. .

-- 98 percent grade , 43 pancakes , no sacks allowed -- devin white , lubbock estacado , sr. . -- 97 percent grade , 128 pancakes , no sacks allowed in 690 snapsreceivers/ends : -- kobe clark , sweetwater , sr. . -- 67-1,473 yds , 23 tds -- erik pizarro , rio hondo , sr. . -- 69-1,206 yds , 17 tdsquarterback : -- brendon lewis , melissa , soph . -- 120-170-2,563 yds , 30 tds passing , 8 ints ; 89-828 yds , 11 tds rushingrunning backs : -- daimarqua foster , wf hirschi , jr. .

-- 179-2,483 yds , 34 tds -- kyle harrison , liberty hill , jr. . -- 165-1,896 yds , 23 tds -- ameer king , freeport brazosport , sr. . -- 2,123 rushing yds , 25 tdskicker : -- saul garcia , raymondville , soph . -- 13-15 fgs , 58 long , 31-31 pat , 24 touchbacks on 51 kickoffsoffensive player of the year : daimarqua foster , wf hirschi ___ first-team defenselinemen : -- darian cortez , raymondville , sr. . -- 86 tackles , 11 sacks , 21 tfl , 3 fumbles caused , 1 fumble recovered , 1 blocked punt -- braden latham , midland greenwood , sr. .

-- 74 tackles , 16 tfl , 11 sacks -- collin o'neal , melissa , jr. . -- 78 tackles , 20 tfl , 7 sacks , 4 fumbles caused , 3 fumble recoveries -- chase petter , argyle , jr. . -- 92 tackles , 62 solos , 22 tfl , 13 sacks , 3 fumbles forced , 2 fumble recoverieslinebackers : -- leshun burns , snyder , sr. . -- 131 tackles , 6 sacks , 25 tfl , 3 fumbles forced , 3 fumble recoveries -- cole daggett , fort stockton , jr. . -- 157 tackles , 121 solos , 3 tfl , 3 fumbles caused -- isaiah white , wf hirschi , sr. .
